original: I can sense the touch of the otherworldly about you.  For what purpose are you here?
translation: 我能感觉到你超凡脱俗的感觉。你来这里是为了什么？

original: Huh, usually Sofia's the one to deliver their invoice.  Alright, hopefully she told you how this works.  Payment's in advance, twenty of their scale coins.  Nowhere near as valuable these days, but it's not completely useless, and at least they can confirm it's not half brass or whatever.
translation: 嗯，通常索菲亚是送发票的人。好吧，希望她告诉你这是怎么回事。提前付款，是他们的20个比例尺硬币。如今，它的价值远不及它的价值，但它并不是完全无用的，至少他们可以确认它不是半黄铜或其他东西。

original: Let's go.
translation: 走吧。

original: [ATTACK] It is clearly already too late for you, then.  Die.
translation: 显然对你来说已经太晚了。死吧。

original: Guess I can try.  Do you know where they are, and anything else about them?
translation: 我想我可以试试。你知道他们在哪里吗？还有其他关于他们的事吗？

original: Can I do anything for you?
translation: 我能为你做点什么吗？

original: This exists to make Capacitance sap moves from the user.
translation: 这是为了使电容sap从用户身上移开。

original:
Arcane Blessing
Using this spell will grant a temporary speed and agility-enhancing effect.  It can be used on yourself or an ally.
translation:
奥术祝福
使用此咒语将获得暂时的速度和敏捷增强效果。它可以用在你自己或盟友身上。

original: Prepares a ritual to turn part of your life force into a usable form of essence.  Doing so will take 5 minutes, inflicting blood loss and damage at the end, as well as potential consequences if overused...
translation: 准备一个仪式，将你生命的一部分转化为一种有用的精华形式。这样做将需要5分钟，造成失血和损伤的最后，以及潜在的后果，如果过度使用。。。

original:
Magic Sign
Using this spell will grant a temporary speed and agility-enhancing effect.  It can be used on yourself or an ally.
translation:
神迹
魔法符号将获得暂时的速度和敏捷增强效果。它可以用在你自己或盟友身上。

original: This grants a specific spell mutation.
translation: 这将授予一个特定的法术变异。

original: Inflicts a bit of biological damage and poison.
translation: 造成一点生物伤害和毒害。

original:
Sanguine Mark
Using this spell will drain energy from your surroundings, creating a void in reality with disruptive effects on a single target.  Machines and some otherworldly creatures will be immune to this attack, but the side effects of channeling that energy will still affect you, fueling your inner fire.  Beware the risk of tearing the fabric of reality.
translation:
乐观的印记
使用这个法术会消耗你周围的能量，在现实中制造一个空白，对一个目标产生破坏性效果。机器和一些超凡脱俗的生物将对这种攻击免疫，但是引导这些能量的副作用仍然会影响到你，助长你的内心之火。当心撕碎现实结构的风险。

original: Real or fake?  You'll have to find out yourself!
translation: 真的还是假的？你得自己找出来！

original: masks of insight (on)
translation: 洞察面具（开）

original: "Ecce, sanguinem magum!"
translation: “幼儿保育和教育，圣洁的马格姆！”

original: So you found what we seek?  My masters would be pleased to make use of your work, and your blood might make a useful sacrifice.
translation: 你找到我们要找的东西了？我的主人会很乐意利用你的工作，你的血可能会成为一个有用的牺牲。

original: [ATTACK] I've heard enough.  Die.
translation: [攻击]我听够了。死吧。

original: You've heard of the Keepers of The Oath, haven't you?  The slaves to their new god from Beyond.  Our disagreements aside, it wasn't right how our order tricked them like that.  I don't know how much of the story you've heard, hunter, so ask away.
translation: 你听说过守誓者，是吗？奴隶们从远方来到他们的新神那里。撇开我们的分歧不谈，我们的命令这样欺骗他们是不对的。我不知道你听过多少故事，亨特，所以请你走开。

original: I can't part with it just yet.  I'm sorry.
translation: 我现在还不能放弃。我很抱歉。

original: I'll see what I can do to help.  We can't afford to lose such valuable information.
translation: 我看看能帮上什么忙。我们不能失去这样有价值的信息。

original: What else can you tell me about those groups?
translation: 你能告诉我那些团体还有什么吗？

original: You mentioned you had answers to go with this task?
translation: 你提到你有答案来完成这项任务？

original: Then I will leave you to your delusions.
translation: 那我就让你去胡思乱想。

original: I've been a part of their group since before things boiled over.  We were focused on hunting down and dealing with some of the anomalies that began to show up in the months leading up to this.
translation: 在事情还没结束之前，我就已经是他们小组的一员了。我们专注于寻找和处理一些异常现象，这些异常现象在这之前的几个月里开始显现出来。

original: [FMC375] You have a deal.
translation: [FMC375]你说好了。

original: The fungal corruption erupts into a shower of blue embers!
translation: 真菌腐败爆发成蓝色余烬阵雨！

original: Time seems to slow for a moment, as you channel a rush of energy.
translation: 时间似乎有点慢了，因为你在引导一股能量。

original: You work a ritual to draw power from your own blood, instinct guiding your hand as you trace patterns across your skin with the dull blade.  As you work the last rune, the only one to actually break the skin, wounds open elsewhere on your body!
translation: 你按照惯例从自己的血液中汲取力量，当你用钝刃在皮肤上描绘图案时，本能会引导你的手。当你使用最后一个符文，唯一一个真正打破皮肤，伤口在你身体的其他地方打开！

original: "Ethereal winds, guide my passage..."  You cast %s!
translation: “飘渺的风，指引我的航程……”你施放了 %s！

original: You gaze deep into the strange patterns, endless spirals weaving through each other...
translation: 你凝视着那些奇怪的图案，无尽的螺旋交织在一起。。。

original: Sickening venom flows from your staff as you strike.
translation: 当你攻击的时候，令人恶心的毒液从你的手杖里流出来。

original: With a strange gesture, the fabric of the Veil warps and decays.  %s!
translation: 以一种奇怪的姿态，面纱的织物扭曲和腐烂。%s ！

original: A mask faced with iron and decorated with other metal, depicting the face of some unknown divine figure.  The face depicted on the mask seems more menacing than it did previously.
translation: 面具，面具一种用铁面和其他金属装饰的面具，描绘某个不知名的神圣人物的脸。面具上描绘的脸看起来比以前更具威胁性。

original: Funny to hear, when you've clearly been sticking your nose in the exact same bad idea the magus is dabbling in.
translation: 有趣的是，当你明显地把你的鼻子伸进了法师正在涉足的同一个坏主意里。

original: You must know of it, don't you?  The magi, the corruption ritual, the THING that drowned the last gasp of both our orders in a deluge of blood and madness.  I hope the magus that concocted that scheme died there with the priests and had his soul devoured by the abomination they ended up summoning.  Tell me, Keeper.  What answers do you seek?
translation: 你一定知道，不是吗？巫师，腐败仪式，把我们两个教团的最后一口气都淹没在血腥和疯狂之中的东西。我希望策划这个阴谋的法师和祭司们一起死在那里，他的灵魂被他们最后召唤的可憎之物吞噬。告诉我，守护者。你在寻找什么答案？

original: How peculiar.  Normally I would consider this to be foolish, for what songs can stone sing?  But I can hear its whispers, it's like a song in another language, yet it sings like bones all the same.  I don't know how I could repay you for such a thing, but would you be willing to part with it?
translation: 真奇怪。通常我会认为这是愚蠢的，因为石头会唱什么歌？但我能听到它的低语，它像一首用另一种语言唱的歌，但它唱起来却像骨头一样。我不知道怎么才能报答你，但你愿意放弃吗？

original: We'll have to see how things go, I guess.
translation: 我想我们得看看情况如何。

original: Used to work on a ranch out of state, also grew up hunting.  Fought like hell to get up here, way everything went down I'm surprised I'm still kicking.  Lot of hard fights and strange shit along the way.
translation: 以前在州外的牧场工作，长大后也打猎。拼命挣扎才爬到这里，一切都是这样，我很惊讶我还在踢。一路上有很多激烈的争吵和奇怪的事情。

original: Welcome to our sanctum.
translation: 欢迎来到我们的圣地。

original: Oh, I see.
translation: 哦，我明白了。

original: So, what I can help with?
translation: 那么，我能帮什么忙？

original: This is a blessing, not an infection.  In such troubled times, we give thanks for the blessing that shelters us.
translation: 这是一种祝福，而不是感染。在这样的困难时期，我们感谢庇佑我们的祝福。

original: I'm one of then, actually.  We have a common interest, doing our best to ensure humanity's survival.  We have our ways, rooted in the otherworldly though they are.
translation: 实际上，我也是其中之一。我们有共同的利益，尽我们最大的努力确保人类的生存。我们有自己的方式，虽然它们是根植于超自然的。

original: Alright.  I'll have someone set up and see if they can finalize this deal with the people that run the place.  Here's hoping it goes well…
translation: 好吧。我会找人来，看看他们能不能和经营这个地方的人敲定这笔交易。希望一切顺利…

original: I guess I can try.  Gives me something to do at least.  What sort of settlement are they supposed to be looking for?
translation: 我想我可以试试。至少能让我做点什么。他们应该寻求什么样的解决方案？

original: I've asked a couple others already, I should probably go check on them.  See you later.
translation: 我已经问过其他人了，我应该去看看。回头见。

original: What the heck is a Merch?
translation: 什么是商品？

original: A shrike, hunter of hunters.  Now I hunt whatever else causes trouble.  Something constructive to do, I suppose.
translation: 伯劳鸟，猎人的猎手。现在我会去寻找任何其他引起麻烦的东西。我想应该做些建设性的事情。

original: "Impium profligatum!"
translation: “乱花钱！”

original: Let them squabble and stab each other in the back, until they destroy themselves over scraps of arcane knowledge.  Join me and live.
translation: 让他们在背后争吵和刺伤对方，直到他们在奥术知识的碎片上毁灭自己。加入我的生活。

original: I think I see the problem.  Let me guess, quit the Order, found religion, and now the Keepers' little friend is pulling your strings?  "No god, no demon, no spirit can be trusted with power over you."  You've compromised your principles, friend.
translation: 我想我看到了问题所在。让我猜猜，退出秩序，找到了宗教信仰，现在看守者的小朋友在牵线搭桥？”没有上帝，没有恶魔，没有灵魂可以信任你。“你已经妥协了你的原则，朋友。

original: I wonder how much you know about that.  Brings to mind stories of the day our Order destroyed itself in its short-sightedness.  I can answer what questions you have.
translation: 我不知道你知道多少。我们的秩序因短视而自我毁灭的故事让人记忆犹新。我可以回答你的问题。

original: I mean no offense by that.  The people here have been welcoming to an extent far beyond any other arcanist sect I have run into in the past.  It's only just, well, Jonathan and the others still seem rather reluctant to bring the others together, and help teach them.
translation: 我没有冒犯的意思。这里的人们对我的欢迎程度远远超过了我过去遇到的任何其他神秘教派。只是，好吧，乔纳森和其他人似乎仍然不愿意把其他人召集起来，帮助他们学习。

original: There's a government official of some sort who seems to have been assigned here by somebody, I'm guessing whoever's actually in charge might know something.  Other than that there's just a local scavenger or two, possibly worth inquiring with them anyway.
translation: 有一个政府官员好像是被人派来的，我猜谁是真正的负责人可能知道些什么。除此之外，这里只有一两个当地的拾荒者，可能值得去问问他们。

original: There are a few other isolated contacts that I'm aware of, but getting in touch with them will prove difficult.  Thane McKinnon and I will do our best, but for all I know you might be the last of our network of contacts remaining out there.
translation: 我知道还有其他一些孤立的联系方式，但与他们取得联系将是困难的。我知道我们的关系网没有了。

original: A collection of scholars and theologians.  Jonathan's group and Sofia's own preceded mine, and a fourth followed.  From there we gathered others, of an even greater range of faiths, few as we were in the end.
translation: 学者和神学家的集合。乔纳森的小组和索菲亚的小组先于我的小组，第四小组紧随其后。从那里，我们聚集了其他人，信仰范围更广，但最后却少之又少。

original: Okay, here are the coins.
translation: 好的，这是硬币。

original: Alright…
translation: 好吧…

original: They're hunters.  Monster hunters these days, in the past they fought with local occult groups and other small-scale threats, before it all boiled over.
translation: 他们是猎人。现在的怪物猎人们，在过去他们与当地的神秘组织和其他小规模的威胁战斗，然后一切都结束了。

original: I'll ask around a bit more while I'm at it.  See you later.
translation: 我去的时候再问问周围的人。回头见。

original: I might be back.
translation: 我可能会回来。

original: You fail to find any obstacles to clear.
translation: 你找不到要清除的障碍。

original: <color_cyan>(Arcana)</color> The Old Man
translation: <color_cyan>(Arcana)</color>古色之人

original: Electrothermal Arc Projector
translation: 电热电弧投影仪

original: Verdant Boost
translation: 青翠促生

original: This gear has been altered by druidic magic, increasing its <good>protection</good>.
translation: 这个装备已经被德鲁伊魔法改变了，增加了<good>防护能力</good>。

original: Magical Energy
translation: 魔法能量

original: carmine vulnerary
translation: 胭脂红

original: They will simply kill you when you cease to be useful to them.  I'll at least let you escape with your life.  Go on, whelp.  Flee.
translation: 当你不再对他们有用时，他们会杀了你。我至少会让你用你的生命逃走。去吧，小鬼。逃走。

original: I have my duties.  They may be idiots but they're my idiots.  If you were interested in not dragging the order to extinction, then you should've left well enough alone while you had the chance.
translation: 我有我的职责。他们可能是白痴，但他们是我的白痴。如果你不想把这个秩序拖到灭绝的地步，那么在你有机会的时候，你应该保持足够的孤独。

original: That brings back memories of a fascinating story, from the old days.  Of magi tampering with another order's sacred relic.  Practically blew up in their face, if I recall.  One of the incidents that encouraged us to break with the Sanguine Order.  What do you want to know about that old tale?
translation: 这让我想起了一个有趣的故事，从过去的日子。三博士篡改另一个骑士团的圣物。如果我记得的话，他们几乎被炸飞了。一个鼓励我们打破乐观秩序的事件。关于那个古老的故事你想知道什么？

original: We still have much to discuss, if you don't mind.
translation: 如果你不介意的话，我们还有很多事情要讨论。

original: That is the reputation the Cleansing Flame has developed among some scholars.  Their approach towards the arcane so variable, so unpredictable.  The community gathered here is the most welcoming I've seen in a long time, but even they keep their knowledge close to their heart.  It doesn't feel like the best way.
translation: 这就是净化之火在一些学者中的名声。他们对奥术的态度如此变化无常，如此变幻莫测。聚集在这里的社区是我很长时间以来所见到的最热情的社区，但即使是他们也把自己的知识放在心上。感觉不是最好的办法。

original: [GS15] You have a deal.
translation: [GS15]你说好了。

original: Sofia and I are working to track down and get in touch with others, but I'm not certain how many more hunting parties, nor any external contacts, are still alive out there.  Only time will tell.
translation: 索菲亚和我正在努力寻找并与其他人取得联系，但我不确定还有多少狩猎聚会，也不知道还有多少外部联系人还活着。只有时间会证明一切。

original: Welcome once again.  How may I help you?
translation: 再次欢迎。我能帮你什么忙？

original: Could you accept 15 instead?
translation: 你能接受15英镑吗？

original: Good to hear, I guess.
translation: 很高兴听到，我想。

original: Monster hunters, primarily.  Decently equipped for their size, if a bit eccentric.
translation: 主要是怪物猎人。如果有点古怪的话，他们的装备也很得体。

original: They seem more interested in having another point of contact with other settlements.  Would be useful, right?
translation: 他们似乎对与其他定居点有另一个接触点更感兴趣。会有用的，对吧？

original: I've asked a couple others already, hopefully that should help.  I should probably check on the outpost.
translation: 我已经问过其他几个人了，希望能有所帮助。我应该去前哨看看。

original: I'll ask around some more as well.  See you later.
translation: 我还会再问问周围的人。回头见。

original: I can arrange a down payment, say 375 Merch, and they'll take care of the rest.
translation: 我可以安排首付款，比如375件商品，剩下的由他们来处理。

original: I could help with that, if you'd like.
translation: 如果你愿意，我可以帮你。

original: The door swings open silently.
translation: 门静静地开着。

original: Earn the trust of an old survivor.
translation: 赢得老幸存者的信任。

original: Integrated into your right hand and arm is a device capable of firing exotic bolts of energy that bounce from target to target, electrocuting and immolating them.
translation: 集成在你的右手和手臂上的是一个装置，能够发射奇异的能量，在目标之间反弹，电击并固定它们。

original: "Subire mortem tuam…"
translation: “死亡之地…”

original: [ATTACK] You're pathetic.  You don't deserve to live.
translation: 你真可怜。你不配活下去。

original: You're welcome.  That's all for now, then.
translation: 不客气。现在就这些了。

original: [GS30] You have a deal.
translation: [GS30]你说好了。

original: Sure, that would help.
translation: 当然，那会有帮助的。

original: Greetings.  You are welcome here, so long as you cause no trouble.
translation: 问候语。欢迎你来，只要你不惹麻烦。

original: That seems remarkably …syncretic.
translation: 这看起来非常…融合。

original: It is an honor to see you again, Chosen.  How may I help you?
translation: 很荣幸再次见到你，被选中的。我能帮你什么忙？

original: I'll be honest, I'm not sure what to make of this place.  My superiors seem to have their own concerns, too.  Top brass knows something I don't, and that worries me.  Just keep this between you and me, okay?
translation: 老实说，我不知道该怎么办。我的上级似乎也有自己的顾虑。高层知道一些我不知道的事情，这让我很担心。你和我之间不要说这个，好吗？

original: I've heard rumors about that, from people bringing in news of the outside world.  Lot of mixed messages and misinformation though.  I have the feeling that whatever they're up to, at least a couple higher up the chain of command might have an interesting in keeping an eye on them, but I'm not sure how well that'll turn out.  What can you tell me about them?
translation: 我听过一些谣言，从那些带来外部世界新闻的人那里。不过，有很多信息混杂和误传。我觉得不管他们在干什么，至少在指挥系统的上层有几个人会有兴趣关注他们，但我不确定结果会有多好。关于他们你能告诉我些什么？

original: I'll look around elsewhere.
translation: 我去别处看看。

original: Thank you.  I'll keep at it for now.
translation: 非常感谢。我现在就继续做。

original: Okay, I'll keep an eye out as best as I can.  Here's hoping a little more trade in the area keeps us from starving.
translation: 好吧，我会尽我所能的留意。我们希望在这个地区多做点贸易，免得我们挨饿。

original: Your body's natural stamina and pain recovery is enhanced.
translation: 你身体的自然耐力和疼痛恢复得到增强。

original: This gear has been altered by druidic magic, increasing its <good>acid and fire resistance</good>.
translation: 这个装备已经被德鲁伊魔法改变了，增加了它的<good>耐酸性和耐火性。

original: Patches of cloth steeped in an alchemical mixture, forming a poultice that refines and focuses its effects.  It can heal injuries beyond simply staving off blood loss, and purge infected wounds before they become septic.  However, it loses its effect on deeper ailments, only staving off spores and providing some painkilling effect.
translation: 浸在炼金术混合物中的一块布片，形成一种药膏，使其效果更加精细和集中。它可以治愈伤口，而不仅仅是避免失血，在感染伤口变成脓毒症之前清除伤口。然而，它对更深层次的疾病失去作用，只会阻止孢子并提供一些止痛效果。

original: I, well.  We've already benefited a bit from our own research.  Even if the master has practically bled us dry for every fragment of knowledge we earn.  This hasn't felt right anymore, ever since it all ended.  But what the hell am I supposed to do?  What are you even suggesting I do?
translation: 一、 嗯。我们已经从我们自己的研究中受益匪浅。即使大师几乎把我们所获得的每一个知识片段都榨干了。自从这一切结束后，我再也感觉不对劲了。但我到底该怎么办？你还建议我做什么？

original: Thank you.  I will need some time to gather its songs.  Perhaps you are correct, that there is more to this than what I have witnessed.  These verses are so far beyond my experience, there is surely great strength in them…
translation: 非常感谢。我需要一些时间来收集它的歌曲。也许你是对的，这件事比我所目睹的还要多。这些诗句远远超出我的经验，其中肯定有很大的力量…

original: What can you tell me about Golden Scales?
translation: 关于金鳞片你能告诉我些什么？

original: Well there's you, obviously!  You're one of the urban contacts as well, I can tell that practically by instinct, that's gotta count for something right?  And then there's the actual hunters all over here, and… well, I dunno other than that.  Nick might know more, I hope.
translation: 好吧，很明显就是你！你也是城市里的一个联系人，我凭直觉就知道，这是有意义的，对吧？然后这里到处都是真正的猎人，而且……嗯，我不知道别的。我希望尼克能知道更多。

original: Greetings.  I know you are, or were, a follower of the Path to Power.  For what purpose have you come here?
translation: 问候语。我知道你是，或者曾经是权力之路的追随者。你来这里是为了什么？

original: I see, thank you.
translation: 我明白了，谢谢。

original: Nevermind.  I'll come back later.
translation: 没有关系。我晚点再来。

original: Welcome back.  How may I help you?
translation: 欢迎回来。我能帮你什么忙？

original: Strange folk, but I don't mind.  They're friendly at least, and know the area fairly well.  Makes hunting in the area a lot less stressful.
translation: 奇怪的人，但我不介意。他们至少很友好，对这个地区也很了解。在狩猎区的压力会小很多。

original: Well good.  I dunno what they could be asking for in that case.  Supplies and labor, especially skilled labor, are still important here.
translation: 很好。我不知道在那种情况下他们会要求什么。物资和劳动力，特别是熟练劳动力，在这里仍然很重要。

original: Thank you.  I'll keep asking around to see where this goes.
translation: 非常感谢。我会继续四处打听，看看这是怎么回事。

original: Small community built out of a fortified church on the roadside, not too far from here.
translation: 在路边的一座坚固的教堂里建了一个小社区，离这里不远。

original: Monsters, usually.  Bandits if they're foolish enough.  If we ever hear about another blood mage still out there practicing the old ways, that should get blood pumping…
translation: 通常是怪物。如果他们够蠢的话。如果我们听说另一个血法师仍然在那里练习旧的方法，那应该可以让血泵…

original: The boards keeping the door sealed decay and crumble away.
translation: 把门封起来的木板腐烂了，碎裂了。

original: "…sub malleo deorum!"
translation: “…小木槌！”

original: Indeed.
translation: 的确。

original: There's everyone here, possibly a few other contacts Nicholas might know more about.  But, we're here, Sofia and her pals are here, and we're surviving.  That's better than nothing, better than a lot of people can say, right?  Well, except those aforementioned people wouldn't be able to say anything because they're dead, but you know what I mean…
translation: 所有人都在这里，可能还有其他一些联系人尼古拉斯可能知道更多。但是，我们在这里，索菲亚和她的朋友们在这里，我们还活着。总比什么都没有好，比很多人都能说的好，对吧？好吧，除了前面提到的那些人因为他们死了而什么都不能说，但是你知道我的意思…

original: The Grandmaster's kin came from a self-styled knightly order, Catholic in origin.  Sofia's, a fellowship of neo-pagans.  My own, predominantly Muslim.  And the fourth was pagan of another sort, if any of them remain and find this place, perhaps they'll be able to tell you more.
translation: 这位大师的亲属来自一个自称的骑士团，出身天主教徒。索非亚，新异教徒的联谊会。我自己的，主要是穆斯林。第四个是另一种异教徒，如果他们中有人留下来找到这个地方，也许他们能告诉你更多。

original: Afraid I can't.  The main reason I'm willing to honor their deal is because those things they use are reliable.  25 grams of three-nines-fine gold, edge reeding, the works.  I doubt they have the means to make any more, but for now they're more useful for trade than any old melted jewelry.
translation: 恐怕不行。我愿意遵守他们的协议的主要原因是他们使用的东西是可靠的。25克三九精金，棱纹，作品。我怀疑他们是否有能力制造更多的珠宝，但就目前而言，它们在贸易上比任何旧的熔化的珠宝都有用。

original: They've got fight in 'em, I can tell that much.  Not the mercenary type or like raiders either, more like the crusadin' type.  Better at drinkin' than I figured them to be, at least.
translation: 他们有战斗力，我能告诉你很多。不是雇佣兵或者类似的突袭者，更像是克鲁萨丁式的。至少比我想象的要好。

original: I don't think either party can afford not to work together for survival.  Go ahead.
translation: 我认为任何一方都不能为了生存而不合作。前进。

original: Alright.  I hope this works out for you.  I'm guessing you should talk to some of the others here, if you can't talk the others into going there, they might at least be able to help get the word out of another community out there.
translation: 好吧。我希望这对你有用。我猜你应该和这里的其他人谈谈，如果你不能说服其他人去那里，他们至少可以帮助把消息从另一个社区传出去。

original: Alright, just tell me about the location and I'll get them on it.  Suppose it's handy to direct them towards steady work instead of competing over small-time jobs.
translation: 好吧，告诉我地点，我会通知他们的。假设引导他们从事稳定的工作，而不是在小时间的工作上竞争会很方便。

original: The garland's recovery effect fades.
translation: 花环的恢复效果减弱。

original: This gear has been altered by druidic magic, reducing its <good>encumbrance</good>.
translation: 这个装备已经被德鲁伊魔法改变了，减少了<good>的负担。

original: Essence
translation: 精华

original: Arcana and Magic Items
translation: <color_cyan>奥术和魔法物品</color>

original: Magic Sign: Agility II
translation: 魔符：敏捷II

original: arcana
translation: 奥术

original: "IT'S FLOATING!  THE TEMPLE IS FLOATING!"
translation: “它在漂浮！庙宇在漂浮！”

original: Inertial Sweep
translation: 惯性扫描

original: mounted electrothermal arc cannon
translation: 安装电热电弧炮

original: wyrmskin armor
translation: 龙皮甲

original: Why are you here?
translation: 你为什么在这里？

original: Join me.  There will be others, and we can set them on the right track.
translation: 加入我。还会有其他人，我们可以让他们走上正轨。

original: We shall see.
translation: 我们拭目以待。

original: Thank you for that.  Sofia, others here, they seem to know that this knowledge can enrich the lives of other survivors too.  I'll have to trust them to lead the way in doing so.
translation: 谢谢你。索菲亚，这里的其他人，他们似乎知道这些知识可以丰富其他幸存者的生活。我必须相信他们会在这方面起带头作用。

original: Well now marshal, I'd be willing to serve as a deputy for half my going rate. 15 Golden Scales, the stuff they use here, should cover my expenses.  After that, lead and I'll follow.
translation: 好吧，现在，元帅，我愿意以我现行工资的一半做副手。15个金鳞片，他们在这里用的东西，应该可以支付我的费用。在那之后，领导我跟着。

original: I'll figure something out.  Thanks, though.
translation: 我会想办法的。不过，谢谢。

original: I see.  That's all then.
translation: 我懂了。就这样吧。

original: Welcome, Sister.  I knew we were not alone just yet.
translation: 欢迎，姐姐。我知道我们并不孤单。

original: Greetings, wanderer.  What brings you to this one's home?
translation: 你好，流浪者。是什么风把你带到这个家来的？

original: They have my men working fairly hard to keep the place in good working order, that's for sure.  But they work pretty damn hard right along with us.  Odd choice of equipment on them I suppose, but it seems to do well enough.
translation: 他们让我的人非常努力地工作，以保持这个地方良好的工作秩序，这是肯定的。但他们和我们一起努力工作。我想他们的设备选择很奇怪，但似乎做得很好。

original: Perhaps you're right.  I'll look into alternatives as well, just in case.  Thank you, however.
translation: 也许你是对的。为了以防万一，我也会研究其他的选择。不过，谢谢你。

original: The effect of the verdant triffid garland is starting to fade.
translation: 青翠三尖树花环的效果开始消退。

original: bad
translation: 坏的

original: Adds a new skill for creating and using magical items, and alters many anomalous monsters.
translation: 增加一个新的技能来创造和使用魔法物品，并改变许多异常怪物。

original: Your knowledge of strange, anomalous powers from far-off worlds.  While certain artifacts are beyond mortal understanding, this skill can be used for creating and using a few odd devices, some with lethal applications.
translation: 你对来自遥远世界的奇异力量的了解。使用一些致命的工具来创造一些超乎寻常的技能。

original: "Saw this chick with horns, just walking around in the fucking fungus.  Playing a flute like the goddamn pied piper."
translation: “看见一个长着角的小妞，在他妈的真菌里到处走。像那该死的吹笛手一样吹笛子。”

original: You drive your weapon's momentum into a sweeping strike at %s
translation: 在%s点，你发动武器的冲力进行大范围打击

original: <npcname> delivers a sweeping strike to %s
translation: <npcname>向%s发起了全面打击

original: An experimental energy weapon that fires bolts of anomalous energy that leap from target to target, leaving burning plasma in its erratic wake.  Inefficient but highly destructive if used in a target-rich environment.
translation: 一种实验性的能量武器，它发射反常的能量，从一个目标跳到另一个目标，留下不稳定的等离子体尾迹。如果在目标丰富的环境中使用，则效率低下，但破坏性极强。

original: sets of wyrmskin armor
translation: 龙皮甲套装

original: a faint, indistinct whisper.
translation: 微弱的，模糊的耳语。

original: We don't have to fight.
translation: 我们不需要战斗。

original: [ATTACK] I expect you to die.
translation: [攻击]我希望你死。

original: I see.  As you were saying?
translation: 我懂了。就像你说的？

original: I see.  You have my curiosity, regardless.  Another time, then.  I need to hear what you have heard, see if there is merit in the verses these peculiar bones sing.
translation: 我懂了。不管怎样，你有我的好奇心。那下次吧。我要听听你所听到的，看看这些奇怪的骨头所唱的诗句是否有价值。

original: 30 of the Golden Scales they use here will cover my expenses.  So long as there's places to explore and loot to find, should be fine by me.
translation: 他们在这里用的30个金鳞片可以支付我的费用。只要有地方可以去探险和打劫，我就可以了。

original: I doubt any of them would be willing to venture out there to find work, even if Sofia might be more welcoming than the staff here.  But if you ask the right questions, someone surely has to know someone else, or might be willing to keep an eye out and assist with winning local traders and scavengers over.  I could help do the same if you would like.
translation: 我怀疑他们中有谁会愿意冒险去那里找工作，即使索菲亚可能比这里的员工更热情。但如果你问对了问题，肯定会有人认识其他人，或者愿意留心，协助争取当地商人和拾荒者。如果你愿意，我可以帮你做同样的事。

original: I've never been to the center myself, so I'm not sure what to suggest.  More hands to help build and hunt would be nice, though I suppose a source of trade would be useful, to keep our supplies well stocked.  I'll trust you to use your discretion.
translation: 我自己从来没有去过中心，所以我不知道该怎么建议。如果能有更多的人手来帮助建造和狩猎，那就太好了，不过我想有一个贸易来源会很有用，这样可以保证我们的物资储备充足。我相信你会运用你的判断力。

original: Okay…
translation: 好吧…

original: You have a deal.
translation: 你说好了。

original: So you can vouch for them, Marshal.  That's good.  I hope you know the risks.  If even half the rumors brought back by survivors that meet with them are true, they're involved in some odd business, and that might attract the wrong kind of attention from top brass.  If you're sure, I'll do what I can to put in word with my superiors to make contact with them and set up a contact.
translation: 所以你可以为他们担保，元帅。很好。我希望你知道风险。如果与他们会面的生还者传闻的一半都是真的，那么他们参与了一些奇怪的事情，这可能会引起高层的错误关注。如果你确定的话，我会尽我所能与我的上级沟通，与他们取得联系并建立联系。

original: I should go check on things over there, actually.
translation: 实际上，我应该去那边看看。

original: Hah.  That is your job, isn't it?  Hunting the wicked and otherworldly.  No offense, but I prefer to deal with such matters myself.  It's a rare chance to put my talents to good use, without harming the innocent.  Feels like it brings purpose to what we called The Path.
translation: 哈。那是你的工作，不是吗？追捕邪恶和超自然的人。无意冒犯，但我更喜欢自己处理这些事情。这是一个难得的机会，在不伤害无辜的情况下，充分发挥我的才能。感觉它给我们所谓的道路带来了目标。

original: "all these demons from their many hells, there is an ORDER to it, i KNOW there is"
translation: “所有这些来自地狱的恶魔，都有一个命令，我知道有”

original: A set of well-decorated leather armor, with serpentine patterns sewn into it and various adjustable straps added.  Using it will conjure a long-lasting spray of acid.
translation: 一套装饰精美的皮革盔甲，上面缝有双翼龙形图案，并增加了各种可调节的肩带。使用它会产生持久的酸雾。

original: [ATTACK] Then let the strong rule.  Die.
translation: [攻击]那就让强者统治。死吧。

original: Still adhere to The Path at heart, huh?  Maybe that's true, but I have my duty.  To follow The Path for the sake of others, a hunter of hunters.  What do you expect me to do, puppet?
translation: 还是坚持走自己的路，对吧？也许是真的，但我有我的责任。为了别人的利益而走这条路，一个猎人的猎人。你希望我做什么，木偶？

original: Let's talk about something else.
translation: 我们谈谈别的事吧。

original: What other survivors came along with you?
translation: 还有什么幸存者和你一起来的？

original: Greetings.  I hope that we can work together.
translation: 问候语。我希望我们能一起工作。

original: "Cast aside your schisms and strife. It has ended countless groups, but it shall not end us.  We are brothers and sisters, and we shall respect the gods in equal measure, disparate though they may be."  We are more than simply people of the book together with heathens, we are brethren.  Our duties demand it.
translation: “抛开你们的分裂和纷争吧。它结束了无数的团体，但它不会结束我们。我们是兄弟姐妹，我们应该平等地尊重神，尽管他们可能是不同的。“我们不仅仅是书中的人，与异教徒在一起，我们是兄弟。我们的职责要求它。

original: On second thought, I'll pay in scales.  Here you go.
translation: 再想一想，我会按比例付款。干得好。

original: Think I got it from here then.  That it?
translation: 我想我是从这里得到的。是吗？

original: For now, I'd rather have this task all to myself.  There are few joys in this new world to be had, and these hunts of mine are a rare chance to cut loose in a way that lets me do some good for once.
translation: 现在，我宁愿把这件事全交给我自己。在这个新的世界里，几乎没有什么乐趣可以享受，而我的这些狩猎活动是一个难得的机会，让我可以做一些有益的事情。

original: "Thanks for the magic spear, jackass"
translation: “谢谢你的魔法长矛，蠢货”

original: quiet, otherworldly humming.
translation: 安静的，超凡脱俗的嗡嗡声。

original: Maybe that's true.  But our unity under The Path has been broken.  It's survival of the strongest now, isn't it?  The magus here won't welcome another into the fold, you'll only be seen as a rival.
translation: 也许这是真的。但我们在这条道路下的团结被打破了。现在是最强者的生存，不是吗？这里的法师不会欢迎其他人加入，你只会被视为对手。

original: Perhaps.  Thinking of the big picture like a shrike, not just about the next kill, hmm?  I still have a duty to these people, incompetent or not.  You expect me to ignore that?
translation: 也许。把大局想得像只伯劳鸟，而不仅仅是下一个被杀，嗯？我对这些人还是有责任的，不管是不是无能。你想让我忽略这个？

original: They put a concealed curse on it.  I don't know for sure how it works, but it was geared towards sabotaging a Keeper communion ritual.  Lethal backlash, summoning some lesser hellspawn under their control, who knows?  Our order was on its last legs and some damn fool magus had a plan they thought would drag us back from the brink at the Keepers' expense.  Didn't work, obviously.
translation: 他们暗地里诅咒它。我不知道它是如何运作的，但它是为了破坏守护者的圣餐仪式。致命的反冲，召唤一些在他们控制下的小地狱生物，谁知道呢？我们的命令已经走到了尽头，一些该死的傻瓜马格斯有一个计划，他们认为会把我们从悬崖边拖回来，代价是守门员。显然没用。

original: Thank you.  I've already convinced a couple others to help, I should go check with Sofia for now.
translation: 非常感谢。我已经说服其他几个人帮忙了，我现在应该去找索菲亚问问。

original: Greetings, Keeper.  The others cannot see the mark of your god upon you, as I can.  We need not be enemies, if your intentions are peaceful.
translation: 你好，守卫。其他人看不见你上帝在你身上的印记，就像我一样。如果你的意图是和平的，我们不必成为敌人。

original: Correct, but the circumstances that warranted our joining were quite severe.  Over the years, the others have worked hard to keep us focused on our goal of protecting others.  As one of our tenets states, "we are brothers and sisters, and we shall respect the gods in equal measure, disparate though they may be."  If that is what it takes in these trying times, so be it.
translation: 是的，但我们加入的条件相当严峻。这些年来，其他人一直在努力让我们专注于保护他人的目标。正如我们的一条信条所说，“我们是兄弟姐妹，我们应该平等地尊重神，尽管他们可能是不同的。”如果这是在这个艰难时期所需要的，那就随它去吧。

original: I don't have enough cash, so I'll pay in gold.
translation: 我没有足够的现金，所以我用黄金支付。

original: Don't give up?  That's all the advice you have?
translation: 不放弃？你的建议就这些？

original: Thank you.  There's something else I wanted to talk about, before I leave.
translation: 非常感谢。在我离开之前，我还想谈谈别的事。

original: Blood Essence
translation: 血之精华

original: "Hey, this isn't fair!  I was only in the cult for the free robes and after-ritual donuts!  I didn't sign up for ANY of this!"
translation: “嘿，这不公平！我只是崇拜免费的长袍和仪式后的甜甜圈！我什么都没报名！”

original: citrine incense
translation: 柠檬香

original: I'm not that familiar with this place, only really found out about it from other survivors.  Some with experience in otherworldly matters, who could confirm this place was a refuge for others who seek knowledge.
translation: 我对这个地方不太熟悉，只是从其他幸存者那里了解到的。一些有着超凡脱俗经验的人，谁能证实这个地方是其他求知者的避难所。

original: Glad to have you aboard.
translation: 很高兴你能来。

original: Thanks, I'll look around a bit more and see if anyone else can help with this.
translation: 谢谢，我再四处看看，看看有没有人能帮忙。

original: I tracked their movements for some time intermittently, along with keeping tabs on other leads.  No sign of person contact with the remainder of the Keepers, but they were overtly been involved in anomalous activity within the past month prior to the beginning of all this.  I will trust you to retrieve any intel as you see fit given your connection to their order, but do exercise caution.
translation: 我断断续续地追踪了他们的行踪一段时间，同时跟踪其他线索。没有任何人与其他饲养员接触的迹象，但在这一切开始之前的一个月里，他们明显参与了异常活动。我相信你会在你认为合适的情况下检索到他们的订单，但是要小心。

original: We were part of an informal network of contacts for our brethren.  Aside from a few officials willing to look the other way, and some eccentric collectors offering their support, most of us were essentially scouts.  We'd investigate leads on potential anomalies in more… public areas, and secure them if we could.  There weren't really that many of us, just as the Cleansing Flame as a whole was stretched thin across the region.
translation: 我们是兄弟们非正式联系网络的一部分。除了一些官员愿意另眼相看，还有一些古怪的收藏家表示支持，我们大多数人基本上都是童子军。我们会调查更多…公共区域潜在异常的线索，并尽可能保护他们。其实我们当中并没有那么多人，就像整个净化之火在整个地区蔓延开来一样。

original: Nevermind.  I'll be back later.
translation: 没有关系。我一会儿回来。

original: Thank you.  I should go check on them, goodbye for now.
translation: 非常感谢。我应该去看看，再见。

original: I see.  Let's try this again from the start.
translation: 我懂了。让我们从头再来一次。

original: A secret passage is revealed in the wall.
translation: 墙上露出一条秘密通道。

original: "I never considered myself one of religion-- yet the lightning from my hands and my Many-Tendriled Thralls compel me to believe."
translation: “我从不认为自己是一个宗教信仰者——然而，从我手中发出的闪电和我那被卷起的枷锁迫使我相信。”

original: Sundering Strike
translation: 破碎打击

original: a soft buzzing noise.
translation: 柔和的嗡嗡声。

original: And your master wants to recreate it?  We don't have to fight.
translation: 你的主人想重现它吗？但我们不想要战斗。

original: Right.  Where were we?
translation: 正确的。我们在哪里？

original: Ivory, more transient and fleeting than bones, but aligned all the same.  I can hear the whispered verses though, this thing sings with a resonance I've never heard before.  If there is any truth to the strange things you've said, I must find out for myself.  Please, I don't think I can repay you properly for this, but would you be willing to part with that?
translation: 象牙，比骨头更短暂，也更短暂，但却一成不变。我能听到低语的诗句，这首歌的共鸣是我从未听过的。如果你所说的奇怪的话有什么道理，我必须亲自去查证。求你了，我想我不能好好报答你，但你愿意放弃吗？

original: Lead the way, then.
translation: 那就带路吧。

original: I'll keep asking around, then.  Thanks.
translation: 那我继续四处打听。谢谢。

original: I tracked their movements for some time intermittently, along with keeping tabs on other leads.  No sign of person contact with the remainder of the Keepers, but they were overtly been involved in anomalous activity within the past month prior to the beginning of all this.  Keep your guard up, and deal with them as needed if they seem unlikely to cooperate.  We can't afford to let this intel slip out of our grasp.
translation: 我断断续续地追踪了他们的行踪一段时间，同时跟踪其他线索。没有任何人与其他饲养员接触的迹象，但在这一切开始之前的一个月里，他们明显参与了异常活动。保持警惕，如果他们看起来不太可能合作，根据需要处理他们。我们不能让这些情报从我们的掌握中溜走。

original: I was what we called an "arcane purifier" before all this started.  Nothing but a fancy way of saying we investigated anomalies in areas where the regular hunters wouldn't exactly blend in.  Generally only the ones trained for getting in somewhere hostile, and dismantling any artifacts they couldn't safely extract, really warranted the title.  But, just as even the smiths and medics are still part of a hunting party, the title gets around.
translation: 在这一切开始之前，我就是我们所说的“神秘净化器”。除了一种花哨的说法，我们调查了那些普通猎人不会完全融入的地区的异常情况。一般来说，只有那些受过训练的人进入敌对的地方，拆除他们无法安全提取的文物，才真正有资格获得这个称号。但是，就像史密斯夫妇和医务人员仍然是狩猎队的一员一样，这个头衔也流传开来。

original: Welcome, traveler.  You may rest here if in need, meager though our sanctum may be.
translation: 欢迎，旅行者。如果需要的话，你可以在这里休息，尽管我们的圣所可能很贫乏。

original: If you have the cash, sure.  I've accepted that group's offers mostly since they've been reliable customers.  I've been honoring their deals pretty close to what they figure it at, so 175 Merch should cover it.
translation: 如果你有现金，当然。我接受了那家公司的报价，因为他们是可靠的客户。我一直在履行他们的交易，与他们的预期相当接近，所以175个商品交易所应该会包括在内。

original: These are dark times, and may yet grow darker still.  I am certain you face the same interloper that drove my order into its final ruin.  But they are only one of many who do not belong here.  What can even be done, if a hundred more unknowable, immortal intruders take its place, and a thousand have already slipped through?  Simple.  We drive them back, any way we can.  Time will tell if this bears fruit.  Whatever truly comes of this, I do not expect that I will live to see it.  The outcome may well be beyond your time as well.
translation: 现在是黑暗的时代，也许还会变得更黑暗。我敢肯定，你所面对的正是那个把我的命令推向最后毁灭的闯入者。但他们只是许多不属于这里的人中的一个。如果又有一百个不朽的不朽入侵者取代了它的位置，而一千个入侵者已经溜走了，那还有什么办法呢？简单。我们尽一切可能把他们赶回去。时间会证明这是否会有结果。无论这件事的真正结果是什么，我都不指望我能活着看到它。结果也可能超出你的时间。

original: So be it, Marshal.  I'll be in contact with the local merchant too since I know they have prior arrangements.  If all goes well, they should be set up by the time you return.  Just hope this pans out…
translation: 就这样吧，元帅。我也会和当地的商人联系，因为我知道他们事先有安排。如果一切顺利的话，你回来的时候就应该准备好了。希望一切顺利…

original: Okay, how much Merch do I need?
translation: 好吧，我需要多少钱？

original: Any others come along with you?
translation: 其他人跟你一起去吗？

original: The steel barrier crumbles into nothingness.
translation: 钢制的屏障破碎成虚无。

original: "The portals can be sealed, I'm sure of it!  There has to be a way…"
translation: “门户是可以密封的，我敢肯定！一定有办法……”

original: You channel your momentum into a disarming blow towards %s
translation: 你把你的冲力导向%s，解除它

original: <npcname> delivers a disarming blow to %s
translation: <npcname>给%s一个解除武装的打击

original: An alchemical mixture permeating a combustible base of charcoal or resin, resulting in a peculiar sort of incense.  Lighting it will rapidly burn away the strange concoction, invigorating its user with a focused effect similar to the potions originally used to make it.  It trades much of its effect on strength and speed for instead directly relieving fatigue through unusual means, though long-term use without rest is not recommended.
translation: 一种渗入可燃木炭或树脂基的炼金术混合物，产生一种特殊的香。点燃它会迅速烧掉这种奇怪的混合物，用一种类似于最初用来制造它的药剂的集中效果来激励它的使用者。它用它对强度和速度的影响来换取通过不寻常的方法直接缓解疲劳，尽管不建议长期使用而不休息。

original: There are many ways to pursue The Path.  It doesn't have to end in us coming to blows.
translation: 这条路有很多种方法。我们不一定非要以打架告终。

original: Let's change the subject.
translation: 我们换个话题吧。

original: What's that about a cowboy?
translation: 牛仔是怎么回事？

original: I'll do what I can to speak with other scavengers that stop by.  I would suggest continuing to check with other people here, the more of us working to attract local traders, the more likely that this will succeed.  While I trust that Sofia's people can take care of any unwanted attention this may attract, the main concern is talking people into visiting a settlement that's relatively unknown.
translation: 我会尽我所能和其他过来的拾荒者谈谈。我建议继续和这里的其他人商量一下，我们越是努力吸引当地商人，就越有可能成功。虽然我相信索菲亚的人可以处理任何不必要的注意，这可能会吸引，主要的担心是说服人们访问一个相对未知的定居点。

original: Just a doctor that got called up into providing medical assistance for 'Old Guard' operations.
translation: 只是一个被召来为“老兵”行动提供医疗援助的医生。

original: Well, thanks for the info.  Bye!
translation: 好吧，谢谢你的消息。再见！

original: Right, got it.
translation: 好的，明白了。

original: "this has gotta be a joke.  alien monsters, sure.  magical essence?  pssh.  probably just a sick prank"
translation: “这一定是个玩笑。外星怪物，当然。神奇的精华？嘘。可能只是个恶作剧”

original: an almost inaudible flap of wings.
translation: 几乎听不见的翅膀拍打声。

original: [ATTACK] This must end, no matter our history.  Stand and fight.
translation: [攻击]不管我们的历史如何，这都必须结束。站起来战斗。

original: I have a better idea, troublemaker.  Your scaly hide might make a passable pair of boots.
translation: 我有个更好的主意，麻烦制造者。你那有鳞的皮也许能做一双普通的靴子。

original: From what little I heard, they drew the attention of some other being out them.  Some idiotic plot to sabotage the Keepers, drag them to Hell with us, I don't know what they were thinking nor what plans they had that would've benefited from it.  Only that the magus responsible for that plan got what they deserved.  I almost wish I was there to see it, though no one who made it out of there survived for very long…
translation: 据我所知，他们引起了其他人的注意。我不知道他们在想什么，也不知道他们有什么计划会从中受益。只是负责那个计划的法师得到了他们应得的。我几乎希望我能在那里看到它，尽管没人能在那里存活很长时间…

original: Got it.
translation: 知道了。

original: I know only that it had been chosen as a sanctum.  I heard of it while visiting with a few survivors, who themselves heard of this place at some point.
translation: 我只知道它被选为圣地。我是在拜访一些幸存者时听说的，他们自己也在某个时候听说过这个地方。

original: Thank you.  I'll bring this back to her.
translation: 非常感谢。我会把这个还给她。

original: Alright.  Thanks, I guess.
translation: 好吧。谢谢，我猜我该谢谢你。

original: And do you still uphold the faith?
translation: 你还坚持信仰吗？

original: Just a local hunter.  Outdoors experience came in handy when it all went to shit, so I guess there's that.
translation: 只是一个当地的猎人。当一切都变得一团糟的时候，户外体验就派上了用场，所以我想是这样的。

original: We must ally with outsiders to survive, and our experience will be to their benefit.  Go for it.
translation: 我们必须与外来者结盟才能生存，我们的经验将对他们有利。去争取吧。

original: Local currency these guys use, Free Merchant Credit Notes.  If you want to buy stuff around here and you don't want to barter away your guns, you need Merch.
translation: 他们用的当地货币，免费的商人信用票据。如果你想在这里买东西，又不想把枪换掉，你需要商品。

original: It's a nice place.  Quiet, but not too vulnerable to attack.  It seems the priestess, Sofia if I recall, keeps the others hunters in line.  Never thought I'd be working with mage hunters…
translation: 这是个好地方。安静，但不太容易受到攻击。似乎女祭司，索菲亚，如果我记得，保持其他猎人排队。从没想过我会和法师猎人一起工作…

original: The bars swing open.
translation: 栅栏打开了。

original: Intense Numbness
translation: 极度麻木

original: Dull Essence
translation: 黑暗精华

original: "Dear Roger, Chappy, Allison and Tom, the cultists that showed up frantically on my doorstep and are currently using my basement for your ritual-- I hope you like molotovs."
translation: “亲爱的罗杰、查比、艾莉森和汤姆，这些邪教分子疯狂地出现在我家门口，目前正在我的地下室里举行你们的仪式——我希望你们喜欢燃烧弹。”

original: revenant crown
translation: 报应王冠

original: We continue our studies, in pursuit of survival.  The magus here is one of those who heard of the Dragonblood Sacrament, and decided that it was one valid option to draw power from Beyond and use it to survive.  And looking at you, it seems that method is indeed a valid one, isn't it?
translation: 为了生存，我们继续学习。这里的法师是听说过龙血圣礼的人之一，并认为这是一个有效的选择，从外面汲取力量并使用它来生存。看看你，似乎这个方法确实是有效的，不是吗？

original: Really have lost sight of things, haven't you?  Let me see if I can get the point across for you.  Fuck you, and fuck your so-called god.  How's that?
translation: 你真的看不见东西了，不是吗？让我看看能不能帮你把重点说清楚。去你妈的，去你所谓的上帝。怎么样？

original: There were a couple others who visited the traders then left.  Only other arrival to stay would be the cowboy.  He's usually loitering outside.
translation: 还有几个人拜访了这些商人，然后离开了。唯一能留下来的就是牛仔。他通常在外面闲逛。

original: Okay, how much do I need?
translation: 好吧，我需要多少钱？

original: What is there to tend to?
translation: 有什么倾向？

original: Pleasure doing business with you.  I'll have my men set up the next caravan with the usual instructions and put together their inventory based on Sofia's recommendations.  Let me print up the receipt.
translation: 很高兴和你做生意。我会让我的人按照通常的指示安排下一个车队，并根据索菲亚的建议整理他们的库存。让我把收据打印出来。

original: I do not know how to slay this enemy, Chosen.  But there is always an option.  No matter how desperate things may seem.  He From Beyond The Veil has no doubt conferred many blessings upon you, some may prove useful tools to aid you in your time of need, and no doubt many other weapons may be at your disposal.  I am hopeful then, that perseverance will see you through long enough to find your answer.
translation: 我不知道如何杀死这个被选中的敌人。但总有一个选择。不管事情看起来多么绝望。他从面纱之外无疑给了你许多祝福，一些可能被证明是有用的工具，在你需要的时候帮助你，毫无疑问，许多其他武器可能在你的使用。我希望，这种毅力会让你度过足够长的时间，找到你的答案。

original: Used to be a soldier, 'bout a decade ago.  Rest of my boys probably would've turned raider if I hadn't been around to knock some sense into 'em.  Now we make a living cleaning up the mess the guys still in service weren't able to unfuck.
translation: 十年前曾是个军人。如果不是我在身边给他们点感觉的话，我其他的孩子们可能会变成袭击者。现在我们靠清理那些还在服役的人无法解开的烂摊子为生。

original: I'll look into alternatives then.  Thank you though.
translation: 那么我会研究其他的选择。不过还是谢谢你。

original: The gate moves of its own accord, opening the way forward.
translation: 大门自动移动，打开了前进的道路。

original: "they are watching, they don't need to be a part of this world to fuck with us"
translation: “他们在看，他们不需要成为这个世界的一部分来和我们做爱”

original: A wicked-looking crown made of precious metal, decorated with scenes of skeletons in a "danse macabre" motif.  A single brilliant gem adorns it, in the center of the scene depicted.  Using it shall yield immunity to food poisoning and parasites, in exchange for increased hunger.  It will not cure existing ailments, only prevent them.
translation: 一个装饰着“邪恶场景”的丹麦人的王冠。一颗璀璨的宝石装饰着它，在画面的中心。使用它可以产生对食物中毒和寄生虫的免疫力，以换取饥饿感的增加。它不能治愈现有的疾病，只能预防它们。

original: "Interloper…"
translation: “入侵者…”

original: We continue our studies, in pursuit of survival.  There are many routes to it, and my master still believes that harnessing the power from Beyond might permit us to adapt to this world.
translation: 为了生存，我们继续学习。通往这个世界的道路有很多，我的主人仍然相信，利用来自远方的力量也许可以让我们适应这个世界。

original: I'm plenty measured in my practice, and I think you'd look better with a bit of said backstabbing.
translation: 在我的练习中，我很有分寸，我想你再多说点背后的话会让你看起来更好。

original: We don't just smash things with hammers, believe it or not.  Rendering it safe yet functional would be a much better outcome.
translation: 我们不只是用锤子砸东西，信不信由你。让它既安全又实用是一个更好的结果。

original: Even among the shambling undead, I have never seen such discord and strife within their bones.  You can practically read the verses etched into every tangled surface, what could create such a thing?  Please, you must give it to me.  I don't know if I could repay you for such a kindness…
translation: 即使是在那些摇摇欲坠的亡灵之中，我也从未见过他们骨子里如此的不和和争斗。你几乎可以读懂刻在每一个纠结的表面上的经文，是什么能创造出这样的东西？拜托，你必须把它给我。我不知道我是否能报答你的好意…

original: You should know how dangerous the Shrikes are, sanguinist.  I doubt you'll be able to just walk in and charm them into giving us what we need, but you're welcome to try.  Personally I'd suggest you err on the side of caution.
translation: 你应该知道伯劳有多危险，乐观主义者。我怀疑你是否能走进来，引诱他们给我们我们所需要的，但欢迎你试试。我个人建议你谨慎行事。

original: Sofia is the one who can tell you the most about this place.  A church, not exactly my specialty as a purifier.  You tend to find actionable intel in old repurposed industrial buildings and research facilities, not cathedrals.  Then again, these days you never know.
translation: 索菲亚是最能告诉你这个地方的人。教堂，不完全是我作为净化者的专长。你倾向于在旧的重新利用的工业建筑和研究设施中找到可操作的情报，而不是大教堂。再说一次，这些天你永远不知道。

original: Let's trade then.
translation: 那我们交易吧。

original: You are a member of the Cleaning Flame, are you not?  I can tell by that fire in your eyes.  Perhaps it is foolish of me to lecture one of you on the virtue of determination.  As your tenets say, so long as the Sun shines upon the Earth.  I'm afraid I know too little of this interloper to guide you.  I would say only to be cautious, but that too is what your order demands, is it not?
translation: 你是清洁之火的一员，是吗？我能从你眼中的火光看出。也许我对你们中的一个人讲决心的美德是愚蠢的。正如你们的信条所说，只要太阳照耀地球。我也不太害怕这个闯入者。我只想说谨慎一点，但这也是你们订货的要求，不是吗？

original: These days, just a scavenger I guess.  Don't have any family left that I know of, so not like my old life doing odd jobs matters much.  Rather not talk about it.
translation: 这些天来，我想只是个拾荒者。据我所知，没有一个家庭离开，所以不像我以前那样做零工很重要。而不是谈论它。

original: Otherworldly stuff, huh.  I've seen and heard a lot of strange things, but that's not something I want to get involved with.  If there's any truth to this, then maybe you have a point.  Still, be careful getting involved in this.  I'll put in my recommendation if you're sure this is the best course of action, Marshal.
translation: 超凡脱俗的东西，哈。我看到和听到了很多奇怪的事情，但这不是我想介入的事情。如果这是真的，那也许你有道理。不过，小心卷入此事。如果你确定这是最好的办法，我会提出我的建议，元帅。

original: The gate swings open silently.
translation: 大门静静地打开。

original: Your body feels incredibly numb and sluggish.
translation: 你的身体感觉到难以置信的麻木和迟缓。

original: "Blood spills from my athame.  It is his blood.  Is he reborn, revitalized through my practices?  Can I ever repay him for his sacrifice?"
translation: “血从我的身体里溢出。是他的血。他是通过我的修行而重生的吗？我能报答他的牺牲吗？”

original: Grab Break
translation: 抓斗休息

original: We have more methods than mere destruction, and a reason for each method used.  Hence, not wishing to destroy this item.
translation: 我们有更多的方法不仅仅是破坏，而且每种方法都有原因。因此，不想销毁这件物品。

original: I see…
translation: 我明白了…

original: Golden Scales are those little coins the locals here use.  Seems it's picking up as a currency.  Personally I'd prefer silver dollars if we're talking hard cash, but you use what you can get if you don't like bartering your shirt away for a hot meal.  These people seem to have some other use for em, too.
translation: 金鳞是当地人使用的小硬币。似乎它作为一种货币正在回升。就我个人而言，如果我们谈的是硬通货，我更喜欢银元，但是如果你不喜欢用你的衬衫来换取一顿热饭，你就用你能得到的。这些人似乎也有其他用处。

original: A deacon from a local parish church.  The priest unfortunately left sometime before all this started and I've never heard from him since.  I fear the worst may have happened, but as it is there is already so much to tend to.
translation: 当地教区教堂的执事。不幸的是，神父在这一切开始之前离开了，我从此再也没有他的消息。我担心最坏的情况可能已经发生，但事实上已经有太多的事情要做了。

original: You can't be serious.  What, is she asking you to just walk in and make friends with them?  They're sanguinists, worse they're the ones trained to fight us.  They'll be expecting you, I'm certain.  If you insist on trying to handle this peacefully, you had better be ready for things to turn into an ambush if things go sour.
translation: 你不可能是认真的。什么，她是要你走进来和他们交朋友吗？他们是乐观主义者，更糟糕的是他们是训练来和我们战斗的人。我肯定他们会等你的。如果你坚持要和平处理这件事，你最好做好准备，一旦事情变糟，事情就会变成伏击。

original: I haven't been here in a long time.  Before I became a member of the Cleansing Flame, might've been a teenager in fact.  To be honest, I recall a distinct lack of palisades back then.  But, I bet the padre was the same guy Sofia had an agreement with, letting us use this place.  Though I guess the deacon back at the center is technically in charge now.
translation: 我很久没来了。在我成为“净化之火”成员之前，事实上可能是个青少年。回想起帕里塞德斯，我就别无选择了。但是，我敢打赌牧师就是索菲亚同意让我们使用这个地方的人。不过我想中心的执事现在应该负责了。

original: Okay, here you go.
translation: 好吧，给你。

original: I do not know what form this interloper may take, what dreadful power and madness you may face.  Be prepared for anything, but that advice is of little use to you.  That you do not lose hope is what's more useful to you.  Without that, you will not find the answers you seek.
translation: 我不知道这个闯入者会采取什么形式，你会面临什么可怕的力量和疯狂。对任何事都要做好准备，但那建议对你没什么用处。你不要失去希望对你更有用。没有这些，你将无法找到你所寻求的答案。

original: One of the shrikes visited to discuss things with Sofia.  She ran off, I'm the only one that decided to stay.
translation: 一个伯劳来找索菲亚讨论事情。她跑了，我是唯一决定留下来的人。

original: The window is forced open.
translation: 窗户被强行打开了。

original: "This is NOT A REAL CHURCH"
translation: “这不是真正的教堂”

original: The %s tries to grab you, but you slip away!
translation: %s试图抓住你，但你溜走了！

original: The %s tries to grab <npcname>, but they slip away!
translation: %s试图抢<npcname>，却溜走了！

original: a faint, indistinct murmur.
translation: 微弱的、模糊的杂音。

original: So I'll need a copy of Sanguine Codex then, great.
translation: 所以我需要一份乐观的法典，太好了。

original: Yeah, an honest-to-God cowboy.  Seems to be a mercenary looking for work, good shot and rather tough for his age.  He helped out when the caravan was attacked by monsters along the way.
translation: 是啊，一个诚实的牛仔。似乎是个唯利是图找工作的人，枪法不错，对他这个年纪来说也相当强悍。他一路上被大篷车救了出来。

original: Thank you.
translation: 非常感谢。

original: It's fine.  Nevermind.
translation: 很好。没有关系。

original: Nevermind, I'll be back later on.
translation: 别客气，我一会儿回来。

original: Good.
translation: 很好。

original: Go ahead, then.
translation: 那就去吧。

original: The window's reinforcements rust away, the window is silently forced open.
translation: 窗户的钢筋锈掉了，窗户被悄悄地推开了。

original: The numbness fades.
translation: 麻木会消失。

original: Crystallized Essence
translation: 结晶精华

original: "alchemy is boring if you aren't taste-testing your potions, to be honest"
translation: “老实说，如果你不去测试你的药水，炼金术是无聊的”

original: Can you trust that your master will share the fruit of these studies with you?
translation: 你能相信你的主人会和你分享这些研究的成果吗？

original: Do you have a copy of Sanguine Codex I can use for that?
translation: 你有我可以用的血法典吗？

original: Oh, okay.  Should be easy enough to replace, since the list is a bit short.  Our needs and resources haven't changed at the moment anyway.  Here you go.
translation: 哦，好吧。应该很容易替换，因为列表有点短。我们的需求和资源目前没有改变。干得好。

original: I help keep records and preserve knowledge that the others have collected.  If you have need of anything, I have gathered a few supplies and books to spare, and could trade for them if you wish.
translation: 我帮助保存记录和保存别人收集的知识。如果您需要什么，我已经收集了一些备用的物资和书籍，如果您愿意，可以用它来交换。

original: Sorry, 20 golden scales is as low as I can.  Gold's not as handy now that the world's ended. I'm already taking their offer just about at face value.
translation: 对不起，20个金鳞片已经够低了。世界末日，黄金不再那么方便了。我已经根据表面价值接受了他们的报价。

original: On second thought, I'll seek out another option.
translation: 再想一想，我会另谋出路。

original: Sure, let's see what you have.
translation: 当然，让我们看看你有什么。

original: The numbing effect of your potion is starting to fade.
translation: 你的药剂的麻木效果开始消退。

original: "Ah, yes… I shall burn this smoke into smaller, dull bits of smoke!"
translation: “啊，是的……我要把烟烧成更小、更暗的烟！”

original: quiet, otherworldly voices.
translation: 安静的，超凡脱俗的声音。

original: [ATTACK] I'll show you and the others just how much of a threat I am.
translation: [攻击]我会让你和其他人知道我有多大的威胁。

original: Oh.  I see.
translation: 哦。我懂了。

original: I have some other questions.
translation: 我还有其他问题。

original: Ah, this is a very traditional manner of hearing the songs, of grasping the power within.  But these hum with verses I have never heard before.  Is this true, that there is something more to learn from these bones?  I cannot repay you for this, but please.  If you would be willing to part with them…
translation: 啊，这是一种非常传统的方式来聆听歌曲，掌握内在的力量。我从来没听过这些诗。这是真的吗，从这些骨头中还有更多的东西要学吗？我不能报答你，但是请。如果你愿意和他们分开…

original: Great.  Occult stuff and vigilantism.  If you know that much about them, and still think they'll get along with the Old Guard, then I'll trust your judgment.  Just say the word, and I'll do what I can to smooth things over.
translation: 伟大的。神秘的东西和警戒。如果你对他们了解那么多，而且仍然认为他们会和老警卫相处得很好，那么我相信你的判断。只要说一句话，我会尽我所能把事情平息。

original: Maybe another time, thank you.
translation: 也许下次吧，谢谢。

original: The boards across the window decay and crumble away, the glass disintegrating soon afterward.
translation: 窗户对面的木板腐烂了，碎了，玻璃不久就碎了。

original: The style of combatives developed by an arcane order, dedicated to fighting in defense of humanity.  Focuses on preserving momentum and fighting multiple opponents, using their fury in different ways depending on their weapon of choice.  The full extent of the style requires proper armament.
translation: 由一个神秘的秩序发展而来的战斗风格，致力于保卫人类的战斗。专注于保持势头和打击多个对手，根据他们选择的武器以不同的方式使用他们的愤怒。这种风格的充分发挥需要适当的武器装备。

original: "do not bbuurn hhiss rrelliics"
translation: “不要乱说”

original: blood effigy
translation: 血像

original: Indeed, I wish the magus would permit us to work together instead.  My master would greatly value what you've learned.  But you'd be considered a threat.
translation: 事实上，我希望法师允许我们一起工作。我的主人会非常重视你所学的。但你会被认为是个威胁。

original: I'll try to figure it out.
translation: 我会设法弄清楚的。

original: Many of the people here are struggling to get by and survive, and there is little that one man can do to help that.  What I can do however is help keep their spirits up, tend to the dead and dying best as I'm able as well.  I am at their service as best as I am able, no matter their faith.
translation: 这里的许多人都在挣扎着生存下去，而一个人却无能为力。但我能做的就是帮助他们振作起来，尽我所能照顾好死去的人。不管他们的信仰如何，我都会尽我所能为他们服务。

original: They're hard-working, but they know more than they let on.  At least, whoever sent them.  Be careful what you say around them.  They are here for a reason, and I'm concerned that it endanger our purpose.
translation: 他们很努力，但他们知道的比他们说的要多。至少，不管是谁送的。小心你在他们身边说的话。他们来这里是有原因的，我担心这会危及我们的目的。

original: Alright.
translation: 好吧。

original: Thank you, I'll go bring this to her.
translation: 谢谢，我去拿这个给她。

original: Thank you.  I'll report back to them, then.
translation: 非常感谢。那么我会向他们汇报的。

original: I'm not one of them, I can assure you.
translation: 我可以向你保证，我不是他们中的一员。

original: Let's trade, then.
translation: 那我们交换吧。

original: Hunting, mainly.  Monsters instead of people now, usually.  More productive these days.  I also have a few items I could trade around if you want.
translation: 主要是打猎。现在通常是怪物而不是人。现在效率更高。如果你愿意的话，我还有一些可以交换的东西。

original: The manhole cover rusts and decays away, falling into the hole.
translation: 井盖生锈腐烂，掉到洞里去了。

original: You whisper a prayer to the gods, and ready yourself in a fluid stance.  Dii vult!
translation: 你向神低声祈祷，然后准备好自己的姿势。迪伊·瓦特！

original: %s whispers something, entering a fluid stance.
translation: %s小声说了些什么，进入了一个流动的姿态。

original: "funny paper did a thing!  feeling great, but everything is tree."
translation: “搞笑报纸做了一件事！感觉很好，但一切都是树。”

original: Illusory Counter
translation: 幻象计数器

original: a faint hissing noise.
translation: 微弱的嘶嘶声。

original: A hunter of hunters.  As you've surely seen, the others can't quite keep themselves from falling to pieces, often literally.
translation: 猎人的猎人。正如你所看到的，其他人无法完全避免自己的崩溃，通常是字面上的。

original: You're working with them too?  Perhaps there's hope for the lot of us after all.  I'm used to seeing you mage hunters trying to smash any relic they can't exploit with their little hammers.  I'm not familiar with the curse's functionality, but the fundamentals of it can be found in the Sanguine Codex.  If you had access to the Keeper's own consecration rituals, you could do something with that.
translation: 你也和他们一起工作？也许我们大家终究还是有希望的。我已经习惯于看到你们这些法师猎人试图用他们的小锤子砸碎任何他们无法利用的遗迹。我不熟悉诅咒的功能，但它的基本原理可以在乐观的法典中找到。如果你能接触到守护者自己的献祭仪式，你可以用它做些什么。

original: I could show you something you might be able to learn from.
translation: 我可以给你看一些你可以学习的东西。

original: Aside from study and any other work I can get, I also have supplies I trade around, helps supplement my efforts to gather new materials and books to ready.  Anything you'd like?
translation: 除了学习和其他我能得到的工作之外，我还可以交换一些生活用品，帮助我收集新的材料和书籍以备不时之需。你想要什么？

original: I have my concerns, but they seem to be trustworthy.  Not well-versed in the arcane, but if need be we can teach them our ways.  Other than that, they seem to mostly just help with day-to-day tasks.
translation: 我有我的担心，但它们似乎值得信赖。不是很精通奥术，但如果需要的话，我们可以教他们我们的方法。除此之外，他们似乎大多只是帮助完成日常任务。

original: I see.  I'm glad that he's doing alright over there.  If you get the chance to stop by, be sure to tell him we're doing okay.  Should put his mind at ease, as I'm sure he's needed over there.
translation: 我懂了。我很高兴他在那边过得很好。如果你有机会过来，一定要告诉他我们没事。他应该放轻松点，我肯定那边需要他。

original: Alright.  Try not to lose this one.
translation: 好吧。尽量不要失去这个。

original: So this is why you have sought me out.  These are dark times, and strange events loom upon the horizon.  I am aware of one source that matches what you likely seek, but that one has seen conquered.  I have sensed, faintly, the presence of another.  The same force which intruded once before has begun to secure a second foothold upon this realm, one of many intruders from Beyond.  Relay this to whoever sent you, and beware the threat that awaits at the heart of this infestation.
translation: 所以这就是你找我的原因。现在是黑暗的时代，奇怪的事件隐约出现在地平线上。我知道有一个源头与你可能寻求的相匹配，但那一个已经被征服了。我隐约感觉到另一个人的存在。以前入侵过一次的同一支部队已经开始在这片土地上获得第二个立足点，这是来自远方的众多入侵者之一。把这件事转告给任何派你来的人，并小心在这场灾难的中心等待着的威胁。

original: I have been chosen by He From Beyond The Veil.
translation: 我是他从面纱之外选择的。

original: The obstacle crumbles to dust.
translation: 障碍物化为尘土。

original: Wyrmskin
translation: 龙之硬肤

original: You fluidly sidestep and counter %s
translation: 你流畅地避开%s号柜台

original: <npcname> sidesteps and counters %s
translation: <npcname>侧台阶和计数器%s

original: A congealed liquid vaguely resembling blood, seemingly pulsing and stirring with a life of its own.  The work of incomplete research into exploiting an otherworldly creature, it can permanently change the body and mind.  Without the original source of this power however, it can only go so far.
translation: 一种凝固的液体，有点像血，似乎有自己的生命在跳动。对开发一个超凡脱俗生物的不完全研究工作，可以永久地改变身体和思想。然而，如果没有这种力量的原始来源，它只能走这么远。

original: I have succeeded where others have failed, pursuing the same method that your master seeks.  Can you really trust your master?.
translation: 我在别人失败的地方取得了成功，追求着你主人所追求的同样的方法。你真的能相信你的主人吗？。

original: I'm aware that your holy book includes consecration rituals that could be adapted to do that.  You'll likely need information on how the curse functions to properly fix it, some of it could perhaps be puzzled out from a copy of Sanguine Codex.
translation: 我知道你的圣书中包括了可以用来做这件事的祭祀仪式。你可能需要关于诅咒如何运作的信息来正确地修复它，其中一些可能会从一本乐观的法典中被弄明白。

original: Perhaps you're right.  We'll see, in time.
translation: 也许你是对的。到时候见吧。

original: Okay, go ahead.
translation: 好吧，说吧。

original: So this is why you have sought me out.  These are dark times, and strange events loom upon the horizon.  I am aware of one source that matches what you likely seek, but there is another.  It is faint, a presence that grows and takes root in this world, a firmer grip with each passing day.  The same force that established a trifling foothold among many other interlopers, has taken root anew.  Relay this to whoever sent you, but pursue this threat with caution.
translation: 所以这就是你找我的原因。现在是黑暗的时代，奇怪的事件隐约出现在地平线上。我知道有一个来源与你可能寻找的相匹配，但还有另一个来源。它是微弱的，一种在这个世界上生长和扎根的存在，一种与日复一日更牢固的握在一起的存在。在许多其他闯入者中站稳脚跟的那股力量，又重新扎根了。把这件事转告给派你的人，但要谨慎行事。

original: I was a student of an arcanist, trained in the art of summoning.
translation: 我是一个神秘主义者的学生，受过召唤术的训练。

original: For now, I help keep people in good health and manage the arrangement between my superiors and the locals here.  I can arrange for trade from our supply shipments if you need me to.
translation: 现在，我帮助人们保持健康，并管理好上级和当地人之间的安排。如果你需要的话，我可以从我们的供应货物中安排贸易。

original: Strengthened
translation: 加强

original: Hunter's Advance (Hammer)
translation: 猎人前进（铁锤）

original: RURAL SLAYINGS CONTINUE: Police are looking into the latest in a series of attacks on rural religious communities, and have announced a suspected connection between attacks previously thought unrelated.  "Rural churches, small-town mosques, even neo-pagan gatherings, all of the attacks show similar patterns." says a local Police Chief.
translation: 农村的杀戮事件仍在继续：警方正在调查一系列针对农村宗教社区的袭击事件中的最新情况，并宣布了这两起袭击事件之间的疑似关联，此前这些袭击被认为是无关的。”乡村教堂，小镇清真寺，甚至新异教徒集会，所有的袭击都显示出类似的模式。

original: an almost inaudible scraping sound.
translation: 几乎听不见的刮擦声。

original: Your master has erred in judgment.  They are not worthy of being followed.
translation: 你的主人判断错误。他们不值得被跟踪。

original: You'll need Keeper magic to fix Keeper relics, that's for certain.  Very few magi had a handle on curse-binding for that matter, so you'll likely need a copy of the Codex on hand too.  Otherwise you're more likely to burn the curse out and turn it into a useless piece of metal.
translation: 你需要守护者魔法来修复守护者的遗物，这是肯定的。很少有法师能处理诅咒绑定，所以你可能也需要一份手边的法典。否则你更有可能把诅咒烧掉，变成一块无用的金属。

original: Of that, I am sure even though I do not know their names.  But they are all beholden to the cycles that we are trapped in.
translation: 尽管我不知道他们的名字，但我敢肯定。但是，他们都受制于我们所陷入的周期。

original: Perhaps I could check on them for you?
translation: 也许我可以帮你查一下？

original: What do you know about what the place used to be?
translation: 你对这个地方以前的情况了解多少？

original: Thank you.  I'll see what I can do.
translation: 非常感谢。我看看我能做些什么。

original: I don't need to explain anything to you.
translation: 我不需要向你解释任何事情。

original: I arrange hunts and scavenging runs mainly, along with keeping the other folks sent here running around, staying busy.  If you need something, I can offer you a good deal from our cut of the hunt.
translation: 我主要安排狩猎和拾荒者跑步，同时让其他被派来的人四处奔波，保持忙碌。如果你需要什么，我可以从我们的狩猎中给你一笔好价钱。

original: I've heard stranger rumors than that, so I suppose if that's what they are at heart, then it's in our best interest to work together.  I still have my reservations about this, but if you're sure, I can get in touch with my superiors and try to win them over.
translation: 我听到过比这更奇怪的谣言，所以我想如果这就是他们的心里话，那么我们最好一起合作。我对此仍有保留意见，但如果你确定的话，我可以和我的上级取得联系，争取他们的支持。

original: The ground weathers the blast unscathed.
translation: 地面经受住了爆炸的冲击而毫发无损。

original:
Every step brings confidence.
+1.0 Dodge skill, +2 Dodge attempts.
Lasts 2 turns.
translation:
每一步都会带来自信。
+1.0闪避技能，+2次闪避尝试。

original: mantle of shadows
translation: 阴影的外衣

original: [ATTACK] Then die, defending your misguided fool of a master.
translation: [攻击] 那么去死吧，为你被误导的傻瓜辩护。

original: [ATTACK] On second thought, how about I rearrange your face?
translation: [攻击]仔细想想，我重新安排一下你的脸怎么样？

original: I don't know if I can help you very directly.  You'll need information on the curse itself first, from a copy of the Sanguine Codex.  Then you'll what the rituals the sword's old owners used for consecrating relics.  That's probably in their book, Oaths To The Chalice.
translation: 我不知道我能不能直接帮你。你首先需要的是诅咒本身的信息，从一份乐观的法典。那你就知道这把剑的老主人用来供奉文物的仪式。这可能在他们的书里，对圣杯的誓言。

original: Merchs are what they call dollar bills around here.  Free Merchant Credit Notes or something.  If you want to buy stuff around here and you don't want to barter away your guns, you need Merch.
translation: Merchs就是他们所说的美元钞票。免费商人信用证什么的。如果你想在这里买东西，又不想把枪换掉，你需要商品。

original: Any way I could do to help with that?
translation: 我能帮上忙吗？

original: Know anything about what happened to the place?
translation: 知道这地方发生了什么事吗？

original: Well, guess they're doing rather well for themselves if our arrangement isn't enough anymore.  The Old Guard representative might know a bit, anyone else dealing in trade here could too.  You can also try the ranch, with people heading there looking for work, they might be willing to try their fortunes some place with more security.  My caravan runners have told me plenty enough to suspect Ms. McKinnon's group can hold their own.
translation: 好吧，如果我们的安排还不够的话，我想他们会做得很好。老警卫代表可能知道一点，任何其他在这里做生意的人也知道。你也可以试试牧场，因为人们都到那里找工作，他们可能愿意在一个更安全的地方试试运气。我的车队司机告诉我很多事情，足以让我怀疑麦金农女士的团队能保住自己的队伍。

original: Mostly help run extra security for the patrols, though these guys don't really need much help with that.  Shoot monsters, get ammo out of the deal, use that to shoot more monsters… cycle of life ain't it?  Or the cycle of death.  Can sell you some if ya want.
translation: 主要是帮助巡逻队加强安全，虽然这些人不需要太多的帮助。射杀怪物，从交易中取出弹药，用它来射杀更多的怪物…生命周期不是吗？或者死亡循环。如果你愿意可以卖给你一些。

original: You feel mighty, like you could take on the world.
translation: 你觉得自己很强大，好像你可以挑战世界。

original: GHOST TOWN BLOODBATH - VIGILANTES SUSPECTED: State Police have uncovered the remains of a clash between a suspected cult and a local gang, in a former Appalachian mining town.  "We first suspected that it was just a drug ring in the wrong place at the wrong time." says the Deputy Superintendent.  "But there are definitely signs that someone else got involved as well, and destroyed a lot of evidence afterward."
translation: 鬼城血案——怀疑是私刑人员：州警察在前阿巴拉契亚矿业城镇发现了一个疑似邪教组织与当地帮派冲突的遗迹。”“我们最初怀疑这只是一个贩毒集团在错误的时间在错误的地点，”副警长说但有明显迹象表明，其他人也参与其中，并在事后销毁了大量证据。”

original: mantles of shadows
translation: 阴影的遮蔽

original: "Cast aside…"
translation: “抛弃…”

original: I would rather we work together, use what you have learned for us to become stronger, together.  But my master will accept no rival in these trying times.  What am I to do?
translation: 我宁愿我们一起工作，用你学到的东西让我们变得更强大，一起。但我的主人不会接受任何对手在这艰难的时刻。我该怎么办？

original: Today's your lucky day, I'm not the one who'll have to clean up the mess.  Go on.  Run.
translation: 今天是你的幸运日，我可不是那个要收拾烂摊子的人。继续。快跑。

original: I could show you something that might explain what I speak of.
translation: 我可以给你看些东西来解释我所说的。

original: Good.  I've taken the time to speak with the others, pass the word around, and study our maps.  I think between what you've brought in and what the other scouts were able to find out, we have a fix on the source of this anomaly.  I want to take some time to prepare yourself, then see me when you're ready.  This may prove to be a difficult fight.
translation: 很好。我花时间和其他人交谈，传递信息，研究我们的地图。我想从你带来的和其他侦察员发现的情况来看，我们已经找到了异常的来源。我想花点时间准备一下，等你准备好了再见我。这可能是一场艰难的战斗。

original: Another time, perhaps.  Thank you though.
translation: 也许下次吧。不过还是谢谢你。

original: Well, guess they're doing rather well for themselves if our arrangement isn't enough anymore.  The Old Guard representative might know a bit, anyone else dealing in trade here could too.  People aren't very eager to go out and risk getting killed, but they might be convinced if they saw that it was safe.  I've heard enough from my caravans to suggest that Ms. McKinnon's group can take care of themselves, at least.
translation: 好吧，如果我们的安排还不够的话，我想他们会做得很好。老警卫代表可能知道一点，任何其他在这里做生意的人也知道。人们并不急于出门冒着被杀的危险，但如果他们看到这里是安全的，他们可能会确信这是安全的。我从我的商队那里听到的已经足够多了，至少麦金农女士的团队可以自理。

original: Mostly just help out around, organize the scavenging runs and manage trade.  Lot of stuff we bring in either goes to the locals or back to the center, but I can make do.
translation: 大部分只是帮忙，组织清理工作和管理贸易。我们带来的很多东西要么给当地人，要么回到中心，但我可以勉强应付。

original: Clay
translation: 粘土

original: Lightning Riposte
translation: 闪电反击

original: A loose-fitting robe of some sort, heavily altered with decorations resting on the shoulders, dyed in a simple dark gray.  Using it will grant a burst of invisibility, at the cost of essence.
translation: 某种宽松的长袍某种宽松的长袍，肩上有装饰，染成简单的深灰色。使用它将以牺牲精华为代价，给予隐形效果。

original: We shouldn't have to fight, ideally we would stand together in times like these.  Were we not destined to rule over the weak and undeserving?  But if my master will accept no rival, and better to stand with them than alone.
translation: 我们不应该吵架，理想情况下我们会在这样的时候站在一起。难道我们不是注定要统治弱者和不配吗？但如果我的主人不接受任何对手，与其独自一人，不如与他们站在一起。

original: Nevermind.  There's no point in arguing over it.
translation: 没有关系。争论是没有意义的。

original: No doubt the others here have ample work to be done.  As for myself, I'll manage.  I feel a bit bad having left the parish unattended though.  There's a group of survivors who knew Father Alexander currently sheltering there, and they likely will be have work to be done too.  I could direct you there if you'd like, in case you wish to visit them yourself.
translation: 毫无疑问，这里的其他人还有很多工作要做。至于我自己，我会处理的。不过，离开教区无人看管我有点难过。有一群幸存者知道亚历山大神父目前在那里避难，他们可能也有工作要做。如果你愿意的话，我可以带你去那里，以防你自己去拜访他们。

original: An old arcanist enclave, right?  I'm afraid I don't know much of practical value beyond Johnathan's own judgment on the potential threat.  But I do recall a bit about the place prior to its infestation.
translation: 一个古老的神秘飞地，对吧？恐怕除了约翰纳森自己对潜在威胁的判断之外，我不知道有多少实际价值。但我确实记得一些关于这个地方在它的侵扰之前。

original: Thanks.  Bye for now.
translation: 谢谢。再见。

original: The barrier flickers out of existence.
translation: 这个障碍消失了。

original: The unnatural strength leaves your body.
translation: 不自然的力量离开了你的身体。

original: Hunter's Advance (Sword)
translation: 猎人前进（剑）

original: STRANGE DREAMS CAUSED BY MASS PANIC: Locals across numerous small-town communities have reported "visions" and disturbing dreams over a three-night period last week.  Those interviewed consistently described floating buildings, occult activity, and demonic figures one affected pastor described as "seraphic".  Psychologists have attributed the wave of recurring dreams to mass panic, citing initial reports being confined to a single community before being reported elsewhere the following day.
translation: 由大规模恐慌引起的奇怪的梦：许多小镇社区的当地人报告说，上周在三个晚上的时间里出现了“幻觉”和令人不安的梦境。那些被采访的人一直描述漂浮的建筑，神秘的活动，以及恶魔般的人物，一位受影响的牧师称之为“六翼天使”。心理学家将这种反复出现的梦境归因于大众的恐慌，他们引用了最初的报道仅限于一个社区，第二天就被报道到其他地方。

original: You deftly parry and riposte %s
translation: 你灵巧地招架和还击%s

original: <npcname> parries and ripostes %s
translation: <npcname>招架和还击%s

original: This is more than ritual.  You have heard the songs, haven't you?  What more do you need?
translation: 这不仅仅是一种仪式。你听过这些歌，是吗？你还需要什么？

original: Yep.  Used to be a ranch hand, and it's still practical for wandering the wastes.  Unholy abominations don't care so much about fancy plate carriers, and anything that'll stop a rifle bullet slows you down.
translation: 是的。以前是个农场工人，现在在荒野上游荡还是很实用的。邪恶可憎的人不太在乎花哨的盘子载体，任何能阻止步枪子弹的东西都会减慢你的速度。

original: I just hope they're alright.  As far as I can tell they can take care of themselves, but in times like this you never know what might happen.
translation: 我只希望他们没事。据我所知，他们可以照顾好自己，但在这样的时候，你永远不知道会发生什么。

original: Very well.  I will do what I can, with the few passers-by who travel through the area.  I am hopeful that will be of use to you.
translation: 很好。我会尽我所能，与少数路过该地区的人一起。我希望这对你有用。

original: The strengthening effect of your potion is starting to fade.
translation: 你的药剂的强化效果开始减弱。

original:
Every step brings confidence.
+5 damage blocked, +2 Block attempts.
Lasts 2 turns.
translation:
每一步都会带来自信。
+5点伤害被阻挡，+2次格挡尝试。

original: flame talisman
translation: 火焰护身符

original: Go ahead and try, interloper.  You'll only die tired.  Let the hunt begin.
translation: 去试试吧，入侵者。你只会累死。开始狩猎吧。

original: No doubt the others here have ample work to be done.  As for myself, I'll manage.  I feel a bit bad having left the parish unattended though.  There's a group of survivors who knew Father Alexander currently sheltering there, and while I'm confident they can take care of themselves, I'm still worried about them.
translation: 毫无疑问，这里的其他人还有很多工作要做。至于我自己，我会处理的。不过，离开教区无人看管我有点难过。有一群幸存者知道亚历山大神父目前在那里避难，虽然我有信心他们能自理，但我仍然担心他们。

original: Whatever killed most of the survivors is still in the area, and we know they're more dangerous at night.  Try not approach during the day.  Look for anything that seems out of place and bring it here.  If I can't figure anything out of it, I'll recommend you to Sofia.
translation: 不管是什么东西杀死了大部分幸存者，现在还在这个地区，我们知道他们在晚上更危险。白天不要靠近。找些不合适的东西带过来。如果我想不出什么办法，我就把你推荐给索菲亚。

original: What did they do there, back then?
translation: 那时候他们在那里做了什么？

original: Understood.
translation: 理解。

original: Reality fails to impose itself on this place.
translation: 现实并没有把自己强加于这个地方。

original: "We have seen the other side.  We must master the potential it affords us."
translation: “我们看到了另一面。我们必须掌握它给我们带来的潜力。”

original: A crude paper talisman marked with strange patterns, and anointed with a meager sacrifice.  It can be used to immolate an enemy at close range, or to rapidly spark a more controlled fire if you're desperate.
translation: 一种粗糙的纸制护身符，上面有奇怪的图案，并涂有少量的祭品。它可以用来近距离献祭敌人，或者在你绝望的情况下迅速点燃一个更可控的火力。

original: Yes, join me.
translation: 是的，跟我来。

original: I already have one.  Thank you, though.
translation: 我已经有一个了。不过，谢谢你。

original: There is something I could show you, that makes the power of your so-called song look like child's play.
translation: 我可以给你看一些东西，让你所谓的歌曲的力量看起来像儿戏。

original: Bring what you found to Sofia, she should be able to help.  I'll look into consulting with the others as well, until you come back with anything.
translation: 把你找到的东西交给索菲亚，她会帮上忙的。我也会考虑和其他人商量，直到你拿了什么回来。

original: I see.  I have something else to ask you about the place.
translation: 我懂了。关于这个地方我还有别的事要问你。

original: They seek to learn from the ways of the Chosen who have come before me.
translation: 他们寻求学习在我面前被拣选者的道路。

original: Stone
translation: 石头

original: "They are not yet ready.  But their time will come."
translation: “他们还没有准备好。但他们的时代会到来的。”

original: [ATTACK] No.  You will face the same judgment as your master.
translation: [攻击]不，你将面临和你主人一样的审判。

original: That would be appreciated, yes.
translation: 谢谢，是的。

original: I have no time to spare for disproving your delusions.  I've nothing more to say to you.
translation: 我没有时间来反驳你的妄想。我没什么可说的了。

original: Visit the center first and foremost, but any contact that has extensive involvement with traders and explorers might know something.  Get at least five confirmed locations and we should have a better understanding of where the epicenter might be.
translation: 首先参观中心，但是任何与商人和探险家有广泛联系的人都可能知道一些事情。得到至少五个确定的地点，我们应该对震中可能在哪里有一个更好的了解。

original: I see.  That's all for now.
translation: 我懂了。现在到此为止。

original: We are both bound by immortal oath.  I chose to come to their aid.
translation: 我们都被不朽的誓言所束缚。我选择帮助他们。

original: What sort of bounties are on offer?
translation: 有什么样的赏金？

original: Hunter's Advance (Unarmed)
translation: 猎人前进（徒手）

original: "Blood, oath, and flame.  They will not see the truth until it is too late."
translation: “血、誓言和火焰。他们看不到真相，直到为时已晚。”

original: Shifting Takedown
translation: 移位取下

original: "Nerhes ashon, varath…"
translation: “尼赫斯阿森，瓦拉特…”

original: You're right.  This isn't the right way to follow The Path.  Would you take me in as an apprentice?
translation: 你说得对。这不是正确的方法。你愿意收留我当学徒吗？

original: Never mind…
translation: 没关系…

original: I'll figure something out myself.
translation: 我自己会想办法的。

original: I do not gather the strength in these bones, amass the Song, simply out of lust for power.  This is my duty, to gather the verses, together with my Kindred.
translation: 我并不是单纯出于对权力的贪欲，在这些骨头里聚集力量，聚敛歌曲。这是我的责任，收集诗句，与我的亲属。

original: It was used by a group of scholars, mystics, and such.  Long before all this started, before the great wounds in The Veil, even before our group became involved in all these strange things.
translation: 它被一群学者、神秘主义者等使用。在这一切开始之前，在面纱上的巨大伤口之前，甚至在我们这群人卷入所有这些奇怪的事情之前。

original: We are not here as hunters, but to make amends and secure knowledge.
translation: 我们来这里不是为了狩猎，而是为了弥补损失和获得知识。

original: Perhaps another time.
translation: 也许下次吧。

original: Speedy
translation: 迅速的

original: "The ritual went awry.  We won't be able to stay here."
translation: “仪式出了问题。我们不能呆在这里了。”

original: You pivot and floor %s with careful use of momentum
translation: 你小心翼翼地利用动量旋转并落地%s

original: <npcname> pivots and floors %s
translation: <npcname>枢轴和地板%s

original: mantle of shadows (on)
translation: 阴影之幔（开）

original: [ATTACK] Fuck off.
translation: [攻击]滚开。

original: I'm aware of that.  Old habits aside, it's good to have a chance to work towards a common goal.  Guessing you'll need a copy of the Codex, then?  I'll trust you with one, if needed for the ritual.
translation: 我知道。抛开过去的习惯，有一个好的机会朝着这个目标努力。我猜你需要一份抄本？如果仪式需要的话，我会相信你的。

original: I was one of their enemies.  What does that tell you?
translation: 我是他们的敌人之一。这说明了什么？

original: Far as steady jobs go, not much.  I got bounties on behalf of the people running this place, however.  Not like shooting people in the face kinda bounties, more monster-hunting and other stuff like that.  Interested?
translation: 就稳定的工作而言，不多。不过，我代表管理这个地方的人拿到了奖金。不像是朝人的脸上开枪，更多的怪物狩猎之类的。有兴趣吗？

original: "No sign of them.  Must've abandoned the place and left it to rot.  But why?"
translation: “没有他们的迹象。一定是抛弃了这个地方，让它腐烂了。但为什么？”

original: mantles of shadows (on
translation: 阴影的遮蔽（开

original: "Vathalos, arovesk…"
translation: “瓦塔洛斯，阿罗维斯克…”

original: I don't think my bones are the same as they were, as different as they are now, along with everything else.
translation: 我觉得我的骨头跟以前不一样了，跟现在不一样了，还有其他的东西。

original: It's a rural church off the side of the road.  I'll mark it on your map as best as I can, though you'll have to reach it yourself.  Look for a woman there by the name of Sofia McKinnon, she should have work for you if you wish to help them out.
translation: 这是路边的一个乡村教堂。我会尽我所能在你的地图上标出它，不过你得自己去。在那里找一个叫索菲亚·麦金农的女人，如果你想帮他们，她应该会为你工作的。
